industryTemplates.title: Styles for every occasion
industryTemplates.description: Headshots optimized for LinkedIn, dating profile photos, casual professional looks, and more. Each style is designed to help you look your best for your specific needs.

qualityControl.title: Quality guaranteed with automatic fixes
qualityControl.description: Photos that fail our quality standards get automatically regenerated. Plus you get free retries based on your plan to perfect your results. Unlike other services where you pay per attempt, we handle quality issues automatically and give you free iterations to get exactly what you want.

howItWorks.title: Professional headshots in 3 simple steps
howItWorks.subtitle: Skip the expensive photographer and awkward poses. Here's how easy it is to get amazing headshots.
howItWorks.guarantee: Risk-free: Try it free to see the quality. No credit card, no commitment.

1.title: Upload your selfie
1.description: Any clear photo of your face works. Selfies, casual photos - we work with what you have.

3.description: Receive 4 stunning variations in 60 seconds. Download your favorites instantly.
